text: Kim Dae-won (; born 10 February 1997) is a South Korean football forward, who plays for Daegu FC in the K League 1. ==Club career== Born on 10 February 1997, Kim scored a goal on his debut for Daegu FC on 25 May 2016, playing against FC Anyang in the K League 2. ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- ! Season !! Club !! League ! Apps !! Goals ! Apps !! Goals ! Apps !! Goals ! Apps !! Goals |- |- ! colspan=3 | South Korea ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | KFA Cup ! colspan=2 | Asia ! colspan=2 | Total |- |2016||rowspan="5"|Daegu FC||rowspan="1"|K League 2||6||1||0||0||colspan="2"|-||6||1 |- |2017||rowspan="4"|K League 1||10||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||10||0 |- |2018||23||3||5||4||colspan="2"|-||28||7 |- |2019||36||4||2||1||6||2||44||7 |- |2020||23||3||2||2||colspan="2"|-||25||5 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !98||11||9||7||6||2||113||20 |} ==International career== In December 2019, Kim was selected to be part of the South Korean squad for the 2020 AFC U-23 Championship, to be held in Thailand. South Korea won the championship, with Kim playing in five matches and scoring a goal against Australia. ==Honors and awards== ===Domestic=== Daegu FC * Korean FA Cup Winners (1) : 2018 ===International=== South Korea U23 *AFC U-23 Championship: 2020 ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:South Korean footballers Category:Daegu FC players Category:K League 1 players
title: Kim Dae-won (footballer, born 1997)
